name: df-metid
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cmetid, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cpsmet)), copab(s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(cv(s0))))), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), nat0)))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ~Met =(s0 ∈ ⋃ ran(PsMet)↦ { < s1, s2 > |((s1 ∈ dom(dom(s0))∧ s2 ∈ dom(dom(s0)))∧(s1[s0]s2)= 0)})
comment: Define the metric identification relation for a pseudometric. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Feb-2018.)
